scripts.say: Why, hello! There you are, Tirpitz!
It's been long since anyone last came here. Especially someone as garish as you...
First I hear a strange explosion, now a Royal Navy carrier has appeared before me...
I am the armoured carrier Victorious, assigned to Special Task Force One. Greetings!
You might be delighted to know that you're rather famous even on the other side of the world!
And how long I've anticipated this mission! It's my chance to fight the Lone Queen in the North!
Have a look at this souvenir from the Eagle Union! It's a specially constructed 1,600 lb armour-piercing bomb!
..."Lone Queen in the North," huh... I like the sound of that.
I've lost count of how many battles I've had like this... But I will still fight with everything I have!
